import sys
input = lambda :sys.stdin.readline().rstrip('\r\n')
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n=int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    ans = 0
    for i in a:
        if i&1==0:
            ans+=i
    print(ans)
